name: Polygon Holes
description:
This is a game I made (and am making) in Unity while learning to make games. It's meant for mobile platform and is here just for testing. It's meant for kids but you can play it no matter your age. I'm not gonna judge.

Controls:

w,s,a,d - move.

m - increase side.

n - decrease side.

My website: www.toBeFish.com
